SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.* FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_NM , NVL(A.AUTH_GRP_DESC, ' ') AS AUTH_GRP_DESC , A.CREATE_DT , A.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM , A.ORD , A.USR_TYP , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00004', A.USR_TYP, '1') AS USR_TYP_NM , A.ACCEPT_USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.ACCEPT_USE_CD, '1') AS ACCEPT_USE_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_PRJ' ORDER BY A.ORD ASC, A.AUTH_GRP_NM ASC ) T WHERE 1=1
AND T.AUTH_GRP_NM LIKE '%'||#searchTargetData#||'%'
AND T.AUTH_GRP_DESC LIKE '%'||#searchTargetData#||'%'
AND T.USE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T.ACCEPT_USE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T.USR_TYP = #searchTargetData#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.MENU_ID , A.MENU_NM , A.UPPER_MENU_ID , SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '2') AS UP_MENU_NM , (SELECT UPPER_MENU_ID FROM STM2000 Z WHERE Z.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND Z.MENU_ID = A.UPPER_MENU_ID) AS UPUP_MENU_ID , SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '3') AS UPUP_MENU_NM , COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '3')) AS GRP_CNT , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '3') ORDER BY ORD ASC) AS GRP_RANK , B.PRJ_ID , B.AUTH_GRP_ID , NVL(B.MAIN_YN, 'N') AS MAIN_YN , NVL(B.ACCESS_YN, 'N') AS ACCESS_YN , NVL(B.SELECT_YN, 'N') AS SELECT_YN , NVL(B.REG_YN, 'N') AS REG_YN , NVL(B.MODIFY_YN, 'N') AS MODIFY_YN , NVL(B.DEL_YN, 'N') AS DEL_YN , NVL(B.EXCEL_YN, 'N') AS EXCEL_YN , NVL(B.PRINT_YN, 'N') AS PRINT_YN , 'R' AS STATUS , A.MENU_TYPE_CD , A.ORD , A.LVL , A.MODULE_TYPE FROM STM2000 A , (SELECT * FROM STM2001 WHERE 1=1 AND AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId#) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID(+) AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID(+) AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND A.SYS_CD = '02'
AND A.USE_CD = '01' ) Z START WITH Z.UPPER_MENU_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR Z.MENU_ID = Z.UPPER_MENU_ID OR Z.UPPER_MENU_ID = Z.UPUP_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY Z.ORD ASC ) Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.LVL = 3

SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.MENU_ID , A.UPPER_MENU_ID , SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '2') AS UP_MENU_NM , (SELECT UPPER_MENU_ID FROM STM2000 Z WHERE Z.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND Z.MENU_ID = A.UPPER_MENU_ID) AS TWO_UPPER_MENU_ID , SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '3') AS UPUP_MENU_NM , A.MENU_NM , A.MENU_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00001', A.MENU_TYPE_CD, '1') AS MENU_TYPE_NM , A.MENU_DESC , A.MENU_URL , A.MENU_PATH , A.MENU_IMG_URL , A.MENU_ICON , A.LVL , A.ORD , A.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP , A.PRJ_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00006', A.PRJ_TYPE, '1') AS PRJ_TYPE_NM , A.MODULE_TYPE , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM STM2001 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND MENU_ID = A.MENU_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS AUT_CNT FROM STM2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# ORDER BY ORD

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM STM2001 A INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM STM2000 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND Z.MENU_ID IN ( SELECT MENU_ID FROM STM2000 WHERE UPPER_MENU_ID = #upMenuId# AND LIC_GRP_ID = Z.LIC_GRP_ID ) ) B ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND ACCESS_YN = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM STM2001 WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND MENU_ID = #menuId#
